text: Schoschana Rabinovici (née Suzanne Weksler; November 14, 1932 – August 2, 2019) was a Holocaust survivor. She was the author of the memoir Dank meiner Mutter (1994) which was published in the United States in 1998 under the title Thanks to My Mother. She survived Vilnius Ghetto and the Kaiserwald and Stutthof Nazi concentration camps as a young girl (ages 8 to 12). ==References== Category:Holocaust survivors Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Lithuanian Jews Category:Writers from Tel Aviv
title: Schoschana Rabinovici
